```{r}
j_burrow_raw <- player_stats %>% filter(player_name == "J.Burrow") %>% mutate_if(is.character, as.factor)
p_mahomes <- player_stats %>% filter(player_name == "P.Mahomes")
```

```{r}
j_burrow_num <- j_burrow_raw %>% 
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric), mean))

j_burrow_fact <- j_burrow_raw %>% slice_head(n = 1) %>% select(where(is.factor)) %>% select(!season_type)

j_burrow <- bind_cols(j_burrow_fact, j_burrow_num)
```

```{r}
j_burrow_json <- jsonlite::toJSON(j_burrow)
## let's goooooooo
```
